headline: Why Lamb Weston (LW) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of potato products company Lamb Weston (NYSE:LW) jumped 3.2% in the afternoon session after the release of a favorable Consumer Price Index (CPI) report showed inflation cooling more than anticipated. The July report from the Bureau of Labor Statistics indicated a year-over-year inflation rate of 2.7%, just below the 2.8% economists had forecast. This suggests that price pressures on consumers may be easing. Particularly beneficial for the sector was the news that the food index remained
